website_summaries.verdict: While the throw-back design is appealing, it has more to offer in the way of aesthetic appeal than it does accurate time keeping.
pros: Stands out for its attractive vintage looks that are reminiscent of old-fashioned pocket watches
Features stainless-steel housing and Roman numerals
cons: Winding the mechanical mechanism daily is recommended, but time in inaccuracies are still common – tends to lose time

customer_reviews.title: Worth a second chance.  THE REVISIT I PROMISED
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. The feel of quality and finish. Unfortunately after 6 hours or so it stops. A tap and a shake it runs for a few hours more. A replacement is on the way. I really like this watch. I promise to revisit my review after the replacement proves to be worth the second chance. OK so now I've had the replacement a couple of weeks now. I have kept it wound and its running perfectly. I'm going to carry it on my cruise in February 2019. Dec. 31st. update. Still working perfectly and quite beautiful
customer_reviews.author: LEO IKE

customer_reviews.title: Broken at arrival
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed again with a gift I bought my other half. He cannot wear a wrist watch, so I bought him a poket watch and he was Super Excited. Well finally wore it for the first time and the hands are broken. I called Amazon just for them to direct me back to the manufacturer since it's been over 30 days. This makes me even more sad because how were we supposed to know without wearing it and his job is dirty so needed a special occasion to break it in. Wore it for the first time to a wedding and it is broken!
customer_reviews.author: Roxee Espee

customer_reviews.title: Classic elegance and exceptional performance  for an economical price.
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely nothing to criticize this watch for...packaging and shipment were both outstanding. The watch is finished beautifully and has kept time accurately ever since it was first wound. The integrated stand is excellent. It may well become the keepsake I pass on to my grandson when he gets older...a finer compliment I cannot think of.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Koga

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T KEEP TIME
customer_reviews.text: It is said that even a clock that is broken is correct twice a day. In this instance, that applies. The watch is nice in appearance, but after a week, this watch consistently loses 90 minutes a day, every day, even when fully wound to the winding resistance point twice a day. Also, the hands are VERY thin, and thus difficult to see against the visually crowded clockwork background. Yes, I understand that for accuracy, you can't beat an electronic quartz movement, but an hour and a half a day? Every day?
customer_reviews.author: Usagi3

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous watch that gets me compliments. It keeps time extremely well and feels nice and solid. It winds smoothly. Edit: After almost a year of owning this watch, it has no noticable scratches on the crystal. The metal has many small scratches (it doesn't bother me) the bow did fall off somewhere but that was more my fault than the watch's. I've noticed that if I wind it twice a day, it keeps time wonderfully. I still think this is a wonderful watch.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pocket watches and this is the lowest priced point one of all. However, you can't tell it by looking at it. I love this watch! Very accurate, classy looking. I prefer it to my other more expensive watches. You can't go wrong with this watch. Its a bargain at roughly $75.
customer_reviews.author: jas

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pocket watch for the price and it has Krystal for the glass instead of plastic which what you get from other pocket watch companies at the 80 dollar price point. Comes with a 2 year warranty and a nice gift box that it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: mark bakken

customer_reviews.title: I use a velour pouch open inside my pocket to protect for Crystal face
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch. Use it for everyday carry, although it looks so nice i almost just put it away. Beautiful and keeps time wind it once a day maybe one minute off time when needs to be wound but just takes a second to fix that. If you want that old time look without breaking the bank i would recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and priced very reasonable... infact I would have expected to pay more
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch very much. It appears to be of fine quality and well made. I have worn it with my vest and received many compliments. I would recommend this watch . My review would have been 5 stars and I give the watch 5 stars but I ordered the white ( silver ) watch and received a gold one. Price is very reasonable for a pocket watch of this quality, it could easily pass as a much more expensive European pocket watch. I have carried this watch for several days now and it so far has kept perfect time.
customer_reviews.author: John Klaren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful timepiece and great gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loved it. I tested the watch for a couple of days before gifting it to make sure it kept time accurately and it was spot on with my digital clock. The piece is sturdy and solid, and beautifully made. My only complaint would be the stand in the back that props the watch up is round so the watch easily rolls over if accidentally touched. Maybe a slightly flattened bottom to the kickstand would fix the problem but all in all this is a beautiful timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy C

customer_reviews.title: Stage-prop chain
customer_reviews.text: Watch arrived in wet damaged package (not senders fault) . Box was dry and presentable. The chain is made of cheap coated material and a complete distraction from the watch. The watch itself is made in China, stamped and there is nothing Swiss about it that I have found except maybe the name. It keeps time so far and the price allows me to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am a pocket watch lover, I wanted to get a stuhrling very badly but instead I got this for my boyfriend on Christmas and he felt in love with it, it is a beautiful piece and it looks like a $1000 watch, well that’s what my mother-in-law thought, and believe me she’s a very fancy woman! Haha! The machinery looks exquisite and it works pretty accurate, I love this watch so much that when my BFF is not carrying it around and just put it in a shelf so I can display it and everyone can appreciate its beauty. I will definitely recommend this and will be buying other designs from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: You have to wind it ONCE a day!
customer_reviews.text: This is a stylish and affordable watch. If you correctly wind it then it is accurate. The people complaining about it losing time probably aren’t winding it correctly. My one complaint is the little screw for the kickstand fell out. Aside from that the watch is great. I’d buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this watch as a gift for our 14 year old son's birthday. He loves the style and the watch seems to be of good quality. Customer service has been more than great just by reaching out to us via email to make sure we were happy and knew how to register the watch for the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2all5

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pocket watch for our 21 year old grandson. He has been into collecting watches for years. He also loves the inside mechanics of watches. This watch was beyond our expectations!! It is beautiful, very well made and an excellent quality. It came in a gorgeous gift box! I would recommend this purchase to anyone who is looking for a unique and beautiful gift!
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Works for a short time
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty watch with repair service for a $20 charge. The watch worked for a couple weeks before it could not be wound further. After sending out for repair it only worked one day. I plan on saving the return money and trying something else.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Father's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Stuhrling Original Mens Vintage Mechanical Pocket Watch. My first was gold and this one silver, I use them for dress. I also have a Stuhrling silver battery operated I wear daily. I truly love the looks and the dependableness of these watches.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Ray Carmack

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous at first but made a great find!
customer_reviews.text: Im giving it 4 stars only because i cant give it 4 and a half. It is exactly what i was looking for. Perfect for the price! I wound it up every morning for a week and a half AND carried all day for that week and a half during physical labor. Never lost a second. I hope they keep selling these on Amazon i will eventually buy a second one just incase something happens to my first. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Bittner

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, it is even more beautiful in person.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is amazing. I bought this watch because I'm tired of batteries. It winds easily, it last almost two days when wound. It gets compliments when I show people. I absolutely love the watch. The price was perfect, the packaging was excellent. It took very little time to arrive. Great company and great product, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Francesco R. Addeo

customer_reviews.title: Quality Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this watch. It is small enough to keep in my jeans coin pocket. It keeps time well -i have to wind it up same time daily, going longer that 24hrs will result in it falling behind. The makers name is in small print but i wish it was printed along the rim of the glass or number faceplate instead of being between the numbers 10 and 2 o'oclock. A minor destraction to a well crafted watch. I love the tiny kickstand. My previous skeleton watch lacked that feature.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I will write another review once issue is figured out. Received an already open and used item. Not wrapped like the others I received and the back latch is broken, missing screw. Looks like someone used it, broke it, then returned it. Disappointed that this product was not screened properly before being shipped out. Beyond frustrating, as these are gifts for my groomsmen. Another level of stress added to my life.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not a top quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas for my father who lives in another state. Eight months later I am visiting him and he takes it out and tells me it doesn't keep time properly.. it never has since the day he got it. I'm very disappointed because it's way to late to replace. What seems like a good product turned out to be junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stuhrling Pocket Watch
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. There are several other pocket watches listed on Amazon, but unfortunately the craftsmanship is nowhere near the Stuhrling pocket watch. The dials are a little difficult to read at times, but it’s something you get use too. The pocket watch has held time for approximately six hours, without any motion or winding it. But overall, it is a quality watch.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Carballosa

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The only criticism, is the clear face to the mechanics causes some difficulty in reading the face sometimes. I love the feel, the accuracy, the look.
customer_reviews.author: Brady D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great watch I love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch that being said setting it is a bit of a guessing game for some reason the second hand will not adjust the hour and minute hands are simple and easy to use I wish the winding instruct instructions were more specific.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: he love it
customer_reviews.text: packaged well and well worth the money I actually bought 2 and I am glad I did Would highly recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: Rita R. Neal

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This watch was a better purchase than I anticipated. I bought this watch as a gift for Valentine’s Day. I wanted to get a something nice with a vintage look, and this watch beat both mine and my boyfriend’s expectations in esthetics, quality, and precision! I’m so happy I found this watch and this company. After doing a little research about the brand, the quality far exceeded the price I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Evans

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, sturdy watch, but erratic at keeping time. Gains time, not always at the same rate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Awesome when I opened the box! Keeps time as it says it does. So far so good! Have only had a few weeks, but very pleased having purchased this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch that won't keep time :(
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this watch to my grandpa, and we all found it amazingly beautiful and well-designed. The little "stand" built into the watch is very unique! However, the watch within a few days started to slow with its timekeeping, and we had no choice but to return it. Such a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Huang

customer_reviews.title: Poor Time Keeper
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of returning this watch. It kept exceptionally poor time, and the hands were so thin that it could be hard to read. It got high marks for case and crystal construction, and I could have lived with the thin hands, but the inconsistent time keeping was not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: loucarreras

customer_reviews.title: I'm buying 4 more of these for my groomsmen.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. Remembering to wind it is easy, the skeleton assembly is absolutely stunning. I rank this watch asome one of my two favorite time pieces that I own. My Movado being the other favorite. Performance wise I have been checking it. It has gained 10 seconds in 2 weeks. Not bad. Amazing mechanical luxury timepiece foe a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: trevor jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good watch for the money. The mechansim was always 1 minute faster. I can deal with that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like a Cheap Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like a cheap knockoff. Wouldn’t dare gift this. Plus the gift box it came in was broken. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pocket watch and a good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking pocket watch and it keeps time just as accurately as other fine Swiss mechanical pocket watches that I own at 20 and 30 times the price of this one. I'm impressed with this watch and enjoy using it. I have other Stuhrling watches and have been pleased with all of them. So far in the short time that I have been using this pocket watch, it has performed flawlessly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Can't see hour hand, min. hand, barly. Very poor design
customer_reviews.text: If you want to know what time it is don't buy this Watch. Hard to see how this got out of the Factory much less the Design Office. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P.

customer_reviews.title: Great retirement gift.
customer_reviews.text: Recipient loved receiving this. I had it engraved with his initials, retirement date and Love, xoxoxo my name. Keeps good time.
customer_reviews.author: Egret

customer_reviews.title: it is a great watch
customer_reviews.text: I received the watch a week ago. it looks like a great watch with the price. During the week, the watch is about one -two minutes faster per day which is not perfect but OK. Other than that I am happy with the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Su

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This watch feels and looks expensive, for under 100 this is a steal, I get a lot of compliments people saying that they like it and personally I really like the finishing and the glass is pretty resistant to scratches
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality pocket watch!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this pocket watch I also ordered another brand of pocket watch. The side by side comparison really made the high quality of this watch stand out. This pocket watch is UNDER PRICED for the quality of product! Even the box that it comes in is top notch presentation. Way to go Stuhrling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The detail was great!!
customer_reviews.text: This pocket watch is a pleasure to own...Very nice to own..
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Y. Sotiriou

customer_reviews.title: has a good feel
customer_reviews.text: This watch has a good feel as you hold it in your hand. It is very appealing to the eye, although it does require good lighting in the room to read it easily. Overall I am very pleased with the craftsmanship for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Malvert

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing to say the least
customer_reviews.text: After three weeks after purchase and receipt, the stem no longer functioned to wind the watch. I could only adjust the time. Pretty shabby for a $90 purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M. Wootton Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Watch is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Watch was perfectly calibrated, didn't need any adjustments, just set the time and wind it up! This was a gift, it looked lovely and came with a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pocket Watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. My wife washed my original one I’ve had for years So happy to find this same company. Arrived quickly and safely.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya C Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as part of his Valentine present. I gave it to him early because I’m an impatient person. He absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: jrhmama12

customer_reviews.title: Such an elegant pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful watch... so far so great... let’s hope it will last for a very long time. But for now, it’s so sharp and elegant, worthy of displaying it at all times. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CasaMando in Dallas, TX

customer_reviews.title: vERY NICE TO THE TOUCH
customer_reviews.text: HANDS COULD BE GOLD TO STAND OUT MORE FROM THE FACE. THIS WOULD ALLOW ME TO SEE THE TIME AT A GLANCE. MY SITE ISNT WHAT IT USE TO BE. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Business Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pocket watch for my husband's birthday and he loves it. When he's not wearing it, he sits it up on it's stand arm, and it looks great on the dresser. The packing is also nice. It shows Stuhrling takes pride in their products.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hollar

customer_reviews.title: Kick stand.
customer_reviews.text: All is good but the kick stand in the back of the watch is very loose. And a little hard to read in low light, but not a deal breaker. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Karwowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!! Excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for about a week and a half. Have let it unwind twice rewound it and it has been keeping time to the second. The packaging, the watch itself is all great quality for eighty bucks....just wish it came with a pouch..
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gatti

customer_reviews.title: It works good so far
customer_reviews.text: The watch works well so far and is really nice looking. I need to measure exactly what one winding will last, but it seems to last at least 24 hours. It has drawn many appreciative breaths and comments from those who have viewed it. I enjoy it so far, and hope to enjoy it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Bowtie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: I got the watch as a gift for my husband for Valentine's Day. He absolutely loves everything about it, the design, the automatic feature, the length of the chain is perfect. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana Pall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pocket watch gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this pocket watch as a gift for one of our nephews. He loves it !
customer_reviews.author: PLento

customer_reviews.title: Its presentation is very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This watch was a gift for a friend I have worked with for 11 years as a retirement gift and he loves it is very beautiful piece and quite easy to read
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not inpressed
customer_reviews.text: Has lost color doesn't keep good time looses 1minute per 24 hours
customer_reviews.author: james micheal reynolds

customer_reviews.title: RIPOFF
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy. Does NOT keep accurate time. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Waffle

customer_reviews.title: ORIGINALNALITY
customer_reviews.text: This product is for my Grandson. It is a Christmas gift. I shop ahead. My grandson collects pocket watches. he is 13yrs. i figure to help him threw the years.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep time.
customer_reviews.text: Quit keeping time two days after receiving. Appears well made but lost about one hour in 24.
customer_reviews.author: chicjk

customer_reviews.title: A gem.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this watch in my hand. The crystals are flawless, the movement is beautiful from the front, and the open back. The stainless is polished to a high shine. The chain is polished well, but I would have prefered a clasp instead of the uncomfortable hook. A gem of a watch, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Crewe

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This watch is BEAUTIFUL. It’s a gift, and I can’t wait for my dad to open it! It’s just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Washington

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: The screws that held the sat and did not last. He has only has it a week we will see Nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: larry haeske

customer_reviews.title: Great Pocket Watch
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with this pocket watch. I have been carrying this watch with regularity and am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Cole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful timepiece.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful timepiece! Excellent craftmanship. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Crap quality...
customer_reviews.text: Worst quality watch I have ever had... died three months into ownership...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You are receiving a quality time piece for inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality once again for a very fair price. My Dad loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew balestracci

customer_reviews.title: Nice, serious pocket watch at good price!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great pocket watch - handsome, running well and smooth, excellent value to buy and own. Good experience with this purchase, definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Tak Him

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice seems to be working fine
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice seems to be working fine. Pocket watch arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Langer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality watch. Is very accurate. A good display piece too
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful workmanship can be difficult to read
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, but it can be hard to read as the fine hands blend into the internals
customer_reviews.author: BrigRat6337

customer_reviews.title: Great collector's keepsake
customer_reviews.text: Watch is stunning! It arrived on time, inside a nice package, and was the perfect gift for my husband's birthday since he has a watch collection.
customer_reviews.author: V. Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift. Nice weight for watch and packaged very nice
customer_reviews.author: Martha M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made.
customer_reviews.text: This really does harken back to a time long ago. The movement is full of incredibly finely toothed gears(wheels) and the escapement is amazingly tiny with a hair spring about the thickness of a human hair. I don't know where this was made. It looks identical to one made by Gotham and so does another model of Sturhlings but I'm holding out hope that the Gotham is a copy because the Gotham's mainspring winding gear states made in china whereas this one does not. I'd like to think they copied this model but I don't know for sure. Either way it's a well made timepiece. We'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: furfoot

customer_reviews.title: Stuhring Skeleton pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and pristine. I had other mechanical watches before, they usually approximate a minute or two in every few days. To my surprise this one is as precise as digital watches. Although I had the watch for a few weeks I am happy with it and I think it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed, high quality, LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: The pictures do not do this product justice!!!! Once I received the watch it is more beautiful in person and has a kickstand to make it stand alone. I'm very very satisfied with this pocket watch. I bought it as a 10 year anniversary gift for my husband and was afraid it would look cheap when it arrived, it is far from that. And I think it's so neat that you can watch the inner workings on the back.. and the best part is he loves it and I never have to buy a single battery as it is a hand wind up watch... I will definitely order another one when this one no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: april harlow

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice. At the end of the day
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. At the end of the day, its usually 2-5 minutes fast though. At least I'll always be early.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but the piece i got was defective
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but the piece i got was defective. It stopped working after 3-4 hrs of winding. Have to return it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jaskanwal

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s gorgeous .. doesn’t look cheap . Very easy to use .. friend absolutely loved it !
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great look and great price
customer_reviews.text: The box is phenomenal, the craftsmanship is lovely, a good solid watch. It is a wind up and it is actually very hard to tell by feel when you have tightened it enough so the skeleton style is perfect to actually see the spring. Very clean design. I prefer fobs that latch over clips but the watch itself is one i wear everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: The watch is beautiful. Looses 4 hours a day no matter how ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. Looses 4 hours a day no matter how I wind it (careful not to overwind)- all a once, periodically through out day.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: Simple Yet Elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pocket watch I’ve ever bought and I’m pleased to report that I’m extremely happy with it. I researched pocket watches for about a month before settling on this one. I want something that wasn’t overpriced but looked awesome at the same time, and that would potentially last many years. Also, it’s not huge either and truly is a pocket watch.
customer_reviews.author: DJFitch

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for a friend. The quality of this item was above my expectations. You will definitely get your money's worth and more.
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: Wind when you reset.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps time poorly given discrepancy upon when you are reminded to do so; but otherwise good to excellent; for the style and effectiveness. I will likely say more when time comes around and I recall to wind. Now; as an example; running straight after 3-4 days at a discrepancy of: 40 mins. Winding once is good for two days; so my recommendation is wind when you reset.
customer_reviews.author: From Paris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but fast running
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this watch! It's meant as a birthday present, so I've not actually seen how well it works while being worn. That being said, I have been winding it and checking on how well it keeps time. So far, it does really well for 2 days, then starts running a minute faster each day. I don't think this watch will be used as an every day time piece, so I'm ok with it (hopefully the recipient will be too!). But for people who want to use it every day it might be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Camogirl

customer_reviews.title: Bad watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch I’ve had for little over a year, Most of that on a shelf. The stand lever was the first thing to go then the winder. This watch is almost as fragile as a Glass Microscope Slide. And sudden movement this watch quits. And of the 20 different watches I have, This is the worst one.
customer_reviews.author: Randy,

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks very nice.... but loses 5 minutes time on a 24 hour period. no way to calibrate it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: just...WOW
customer_reviews.text: Take a look at the price. Now double it. Seriously, this is what it feels like you just did. I expected a cheaply made watch for my father, but one with enough metal to look just ok. Instead I received a boxed watch with a polish and glean, looking to be mid grade. It is not high dollar value, and it does not look like I spent six years salary on it, but it surely doesn't look like I spent as little as I did. This is quality at a cut-rate price! I was actually tempted to keep it....but by father is worth more than my selfishness.
customer_reviews.author: L. McNerneyTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Very Special
customer_reviews.text: Very distinguished. Wore at my son's wedding and had many comments. Did not have vest, so could not use chain. Truly recommend, but price is a bit high.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Buy one, today!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this watch every day. It's a good-looking, sturdy watch that always gets compliments. I've worn it with a waistcoat or just slip it into the small pocket of my jeans and let the silver chain dangle on the outside. My only complaint is that sometimes the Stuhrling label on the face interferes with reading the actual time.
customer_reviews.author: Javier H.

customer_reviews.title: Classic beauty in a pocket watch.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my son, who has a very classic style. I wanted something beautiful at a price that I could handle. There are many watches that are less expensive, but do not have near the classic beauty of this watch. He loved that he could see the gears working, and when he began his professional career, has carried it often. It has heirloom beauty, I highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Schilling

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL WATCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Stuhrling Pocket Watch for our grandson's 8th grade Graduation. This continues a tradition we started with our other two grandsons. The Stuhrling did not disappoint, it is a lovely watch in a very nice presentation box, our grandson was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lingo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking pocket watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my boyfriend- he is a visual merchandiser at a suit store, and has to dress well and look really good at work. He LOVES this pocket watch, and so do all of his coworkers. It looks and feels very sturdy and good, and it makes such a satisfying sound when he winds it. It's become his signature piece and a lot of his clients now even know him as 'the guy with the pocket watch.' I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Shedlock

customer_reviews.title: I bought thiswatch 2 months ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch 2 months ago, and it already does not work. The watch looks good, it looks well constructed and it is nice. It JUST looks well done: in its heart, it is not! If you want to spend 80 dollar for a watch that lasts 2 months (this are more than 2 dollar per day),,,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks great & keeps time
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be reliable, looks great & keeps time. I ordered a different chain for it; as the belt clasp seemed to be a bit flimsy. Other than that - no complaints
customer_reviews.author: steve stegle

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Neat watch. To rewind look down on the steam and twist. At first, I was looking at the face and rewinding and couldn't figure out why it kept running down :-O
customer_reviews.author: Justa Sal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch so far. Keeps time good so far, i need more time to give a better rating.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband always wanted a nice pocket watch, so I got him this for our anniversary. He loves it and gets a lot of compliments on it. Well made, nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but clip broke easily
customer_reviews.text: He loves it! Although, the connector for the chain to clip on to clothing broke really easily. We fixed it, because it wasn't worth sending back for the warranty
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Dooby Doo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for me for our anniversary. I've always wanted one. I love this watch. It feels sturdy and looks amazing. I love how you can see the movement of the mechanism. The chain is long enough to allow for placement in the coin pocket without having a chain hanging down to your knee. This is a great watch. It appears to hold time very well and stays wound for a very long time. I'm extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Mccarty II

customer_reviews.title: Looked great in his tux with the watch as the best ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend as a surprise and he loves it. Looked great in his tux with the watch as the best man!
customer_reviews.author: KC

product_meta.title: Stuhrling Original Men's 6053.33113 Special Reserve Vintage
product_meta.description:
With dedication to the heritage of watchmaking, Stührling Original timepieces appeal to the most discriminating taste at reasonable prices. Through meticulous labor and rigorous testing, the vision of the Stührling Original timepiece is brought to life inside our workshops, where “Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of intelligent effort.” 


Assembling a Stührling Original mechanical automatic movement comprises no less than 30 checkpoints, spread throughout the assembly process. The movement must meet more than 7 criteria, including a mean variation in rate which is the highest standard in its class in the industry. Stührling Original remains committed to its mission of preserving high manufacturing standards on all of their fine timepieces. Each and every model conveys an inimitable story with extraordinary style.



The Vintage is one of the latest pocket watches to join Stuhrling Original’s Special Reserve Collection. This fascinating timepiece features a case constructed from solid stainless steel with a step design bezel. The skeleton dial is cut away to reveal the elegant mechanical movement. It comes equipped with a 14 inch solid stainless steel chain.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :1.65 x 11.5 x 3.62 inches; 3.2 Ounces
 * Item model number :6053.33113
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required.
 * Date First Available :November 23, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Stuhrling Original
 * ASIN :B00AAQRJA8

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};

    *  #40937 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.2 out of 5 stars277 ratings

feature_bullets: Stainless steel pocket watch featuring skeleton dual-sided dial, Roman numeral hour markers, and 12" link chain with belt clip
Mechanical hand-wind movement with analog display
Dual-sided protective Krysterna crystal dial window
Mechanical Movement - the crown needs to be wound 25 -30 winds or until you feel resistance, every twenty four to thirty six hours.
